channel.title: I need compile help!
channel.description:
everytime i try to compile my server it says
the system cannot find the path specified
i have jdk 6 update 7 so heres wat i put under user variables for path and classpath
for classpath i put [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
for path i put [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin; [/code]
i dont think there wrong.. help idk what im doing wrong

item.title: I need compile help!
item.dc:creator: @blitz_n_dd3 blitz n dd3
item.description:
@blitz_n_dd3 wrote:

Easy. Just download another compiler and your ready to go. This error always happens to me, and i just download new compiler and it fixes it.

Read full topic
